headline: Intercontinental Exchange CFO Warren Gardiner to Present at the BofA Financial Services Conference on February 10
summary: ATLANTA & MIAMI, January 27, 2026--Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (NYSE:ICE), a leading global provider of technology and data, announced today that Warren Gardiner, CFO, will present at the BofA Financial Services Conference. The presentation will take place on Tuesday, February 10 at 1:00 p.m. ET. The presentation will be available live and in replay via webcast and can be accessed in the investor relations and media section of ICE’s website at http://ir.theice.com.

headline: Intercontinental Exchange launches new tool with Reddit to use conversations as market signals
summary: Chris Edmonds, Intercontinental Exchange president, joins 'Squawk on the Street' to discuss the launch of the company's new partnership with Reddit, examples of how it'll work and much more.

headline: How Evolving Analyst Views Are Shaping The Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Investment Story
summary: Intercontinental Exchange is back in focus after a fresh price target update, which signals a shift in how analysts are framing the stock’s potential. With the previous target at none and the new target at none, the change itself has become part of the story investors are watching. Stay tuned to learn how you can keep track of this evolving narrative and future updates that may shape your view of the stock.
